chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: stack nat

Goal:
tau2 A <<= sym A

Premises:
tau2 = fix tau2 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | (_, y) :: A0 => y ++ tau2 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> string X Arguments tau2 {X}%type_scope
sym = fix sym R : list nat := match R with | [] => [] | (x, y) :: R0 => x ++ y ++ sym R0 end : stack nat -> list nat
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
stack = fun X : Type => list (card X) : Type -> Type Arguments stack _%type_scope
sym_mono : forall A P, A <<= P -> sym A <<= sym P
MPCP = fun '(x, y, P) => exists A, A <<= (x, y) :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : card nat * stack nat -> Prop
tau1_sym : forall A, tau1 A <<= sym A
tau2_app : forall A0 B : stack ?X, tau2 (A0 ++ B) = tau2 A0 ++ tau2 B where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type]
MPCPb = fun '(x, y, P) => exists A : stack bool, A <<= (x, y) :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : card bool * stack bool -> Prop
PCPX = fun (X : Type) (P : stack X) => exists A : list (card X), A <<= P /\ A <> [] /\ tau1 A = tau2 A : forall X : Type, stack X -> Prop Arguments PCPX {X}%type_scope
tau2_cards : forall x : list ?X, tau2 (cards x) = x where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type]
sym_map : forall (X : Type) (f : X -> card nat) (l : list X) (Sigma : list nat), (forall x : X, x el l -> sym [f x] <<= Sigma) -> sym (map f l) <<= Sigma
sym_app : forall P R, sym (P ++ R) = sym P ++ sym R
sym_word_l : forall R (u v : list nat), (u, v) el R -> u <<= sym R
sym_word_R : forall R (u v : list nat), (u, v) el R -> v <<= sym R
tau2_inv : forall a (B : stack nat) (z : list nat), tau2 B = a :: z -> exists x y : list nat, (y, a :: x) el B
nth : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> A -> A
app_incl_l : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> A <<= C
PCP = PCPX : stack nat -> Prop
firstn : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> list A
cons_incl : forall (X : Type) (a : X) (A B : list X), a :: A <<= B -> A <<= B
iPCPb = fun P : stack bool => exists A : list nat, (forall a, a el A -> a < | P |) /\ A <> [] /\ itau1 P A = itau2 P A : stack bool -> Prop
itau2_app : forall A0 B : list nat, itau2 ?P (A0 ++ B) = itau2 ?P A0 ++ itau2 ?P B where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type] ?P : [A : stack nat |- stack ?X]
itau1_app : forall A0 B : list nat, itau1 ?P (A0 ++ B) = itau1 ?P A0 ++ itau1 ?P B where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type] ?P : [A : stack nat |- stack ?X]
VectorDef.fold_right2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?C) -> ?C -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> ?C where ?A : [A : stack nat |- Type] ?B : [A : stack nat |- Type] ?C : [A : stack nat |- Type]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [A : stack nat |- Type] ?n : [A : stack nat |- nat]
VectorDef.fold_right : (?A -> ?B -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : stack nat |- Type] ?B : [A : stack nat |- Type]
app_incl_R : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> B <<= C
PeanoNat.Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
tau1_app : forall A0 B : stack ?X, tau1 (A0 ++ B) = tau1 A0 ++ tau1 B where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type]
der_sing : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X), (x, y) el P -> derivable P x y where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type]
incl_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), l1 <<= l2 -> map f l1 <<= map f l2
itau1 = fix itau1 (X : Type) (P : stack X) (A : list nat) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | i :: A0 => fst (nth i P ([], [])) ++ itau1 X P A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> list nat -> string X Arguments itau1 {X}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
itau2 = fix itau2 (X : Type) (P : stack X) (A : list nat) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | i :: A0 => snd (nth i P ([], [])) ++ itau2 X P A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> list nat -> string X Arguments itau2 {X}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
incl_filter : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l <<= l
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
der_cons : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X) (u v : string ?X), (x, y) el P -> derivable P u v -> derivable P (x ++ u) (y ++ v) where ?X : [A : stack nat |- Type]
incl_Forall_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l <<= l' < -> Forall (fun x : A => x el l') l
incl_Exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l1 <<= l2 -> Exists P l1 -> Exists P l2
incl_Forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l2 <<= l1 -> Forall P l1 -> Forall P l2
tau1 = fix tau1 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | (x, _) :: A0 => x ++ tau1 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> string X Arguments tau1 {X}%type_scope
incl_tran : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l <<= m -> m <<= n -> l <<= n
PeanoNat.Nat.lnot = fun a n : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.lxor a (PeanoNat.Nat.ones n) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.lnot (_ _)%nat_scope
incl_app_inv : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m : list A), l1 ++ l2 <<= m -> l1 <<= m /\ l2 <<= m

```   
unfold sym. intros. induction A as [| [x y] A IH].
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. apply incl_app_inv in H. destruct H. apply incl_tran with (m:=x++y). apply incl_app_l. apply sym_word_l with (u:=x)(v:=y). auto. apply IH. auto.
```

original: unfold sym. intros. induction A as [| [x y] A IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. apply incl_app_inv in H. destruct H. apply incl_tran with (m:=x++y). apply incl_app_l. apply sym_word_l with (u:=x)(v:=y). auto. apply IH. auto.
